system.description:
Also at 20th level your vast swaths of knowledge leave you ready for almost anything. You are under the constant effects of a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.kbdluu7o446n2opz]{Foresight} spell.

In addition you regain the use of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.jet01i63abb2v66h]{Measure Twice, Cut Once} after a successful use whenever you finish a long rest.
